title: Sweet and sour pork and prawns with jasmine rice
description: This sweet and sour pork and prawns recipe with rice is ready in just 20 minutes, making it the perfect midweek meal.
ingredients: Handful of fresh coriander leaves to serve

method.Step 1: Put all the sauce ingredients into a pan with 100ml water. Stir, bring to the boil, then simmer for a couple of minutes until thickened.

method.Step 2: Simmer the rice in salted water for 10-12 minutes until tender, then drain. Meanwhile, heat 1 tbsp of the oil in a wok or pan, fry the peppers and spring onions for 1 minute, then remove and set aside.

method.Step 3: Heat the remaining oil in the wok, fry the pork for 5 minutes, turning, until cooked, then add the prawns and cook for 1 minute until pink. Return the veg to the wok with the pineapple and sauce, then heat through. Serve with the rice, sprinkled with coriander.
